name: Dark Theme

card_styles.card: bg-gray-800 rounded-xl border border-gray-700 shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all
card_styles.card_header: flex items-center gap-3 p-4 border-b border-gray-700

keybind_styles.key: bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 rounded-md px-2 py-1 font-mono text-sm font-semibold text-gray-100

grid_styles.container: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-4 sm:gap-6

print_styles: @media print { * { box-shadow: none !important; text-shadow: none !important; } body { background: white !important; color: black !important; font-size: 10pt; } .container { max-width: none !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0.5cm !important; } .grid { display: grid !important; grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr) !important; gap: 0.5cm !important; } @media print and (max-width: 8.5in) { .grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr !important; } } .card, .bg-gray-800, .bg-gray-900, .bg-blue-900, .bg-purple-900 { background: white !important; border: 1px solid #000 !important; page-break-inside: avoid; margin-bottom: 0.5cm; } .card-header, .bg-blue-900, .bg-purple-900 { background: white !important; border-bottom: 1px solid #000 !important; } .text-gray-100, .text-blue-100, .text-purple-100, .text-blue-400, .text-purple-400 { color: #333 !important; } .border-gray-700, .border-gray-600, .border-b { border-color: #000 !important; } .keybind-key, .bg-gray-700 { background: white !important; border: 1px solid #000 !important; color: black !important; } table { border-collapse: collapse !important; } td, th { border: 1px solid #000 !important; } }
